name: Messy Moss
description:
Theme: Nature
Modifier: Personalisation

Aim of the game:
Find the items listed on the side and to complete tasks

How to play:
Remove or pickup items using the selection of tools displayed on the side of the screen. Drag the magnifying glass around the screen to see different parts of the map.

Controls:
 Mouse Drag - Move the magnifying glass around the screen
Numbers '1', '2' & '3' - Select the appropriate tool (or just click the tool on the side)
'P' - Pause the menu to restart or mute audio

Notes:
Play in full screen
Have fun and leave some feedback :)
